page.title: 05A DAY IN THE LIFE OF A CHILD
page.content:
At half past ten we went out for break. I ate my Breakaway and Zoe and I talked. At a quarter to eleven we were called into School and Mrs Bide taught us. First we had reading until quarter past eleven and then we had to go outside and draw a tree. I drew an oak. At twelve o'clock we had dinner. As the weather was sunny we had our dinner in the field. I had a packet of{crisps, some sandwiches and an {apple.}After dinner Zoe and I played horses until one o'clock.
After break we had athletics. Kirsty came down to the field as well. We had athletics until break. We played horses again.
After break we had history.
